name: Trong Hieu
description: '''Trong Hieu Nguyen''' ({{Langx|vi|italic=no|Nguyễn Trọng Hiếu}}; born 4 July 1992), known professionally as '''Trọng Hiếu''' or '''(S)Trong''' (stylised in [[all caps]]), is a Vietnamese-German singer, best known for winning the [[Vietnam Idol#Season 6 (2015)|sixth season]] of ''[[Vietnam Idol]]'' in 2015.
